page.title: 02Local Government.
page.content: Our parish is called{Worthen}parish. It is divided into three wards which are called Heath, Hope and Worthen. Our ward is Heath ward. There are{1697 people in our parish and{1371}are over 18. We have 16 parish councillors, 5 for Heath and Hope and 6 for Worthen. They have elections every four years. At present the parish council have a lot of work involving{footpaths}and {bridle-ways.} The last mapping of these was done in {1908}but now they are reviewing it and checking to see if they are passable. Wealthy people left money to the parish council, this was put in the bank and the interest is given to the poor. Filled graveyards are the parish councils responsibility. They get money for road mending from the rates. The clerk doesn't get paid much. Money for schools comes from the rates.
